panels.description: Valores obtenidos por el modelo a partir de los datos de la cámara.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  valor_prediccion,
  fecha
FROM
  (SELECT * FROM grafanadb.predicciones ORDER BY ID DESC LIMIT 10000) AS subquery
ORDER BY
  ID ASC

panels.title: Valores

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  valor_prediccion
FROM
  (SELECT * FROM grafanadb.predicciones ORDER BY ID DESC LIMIT 100) AS subquery
ORDER BY
  ID ASC

SELECT
latitud, longitud
FROM
  grafanadb.ubicaciones
ORDER BY
  ID DESC
LIMIT
  100

SELECT latitud, longitud
FROM grafanadb.ubicaciones
ORDER BY id DESC
LIMIT 1;

panels.description: Tiempo que tarda el sistema desde la toma de datos hasta el mensaje de alerta

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(fecha)
AS
  "Last"
FROM
  grafanadb.registro_consultas
WHERE
  ID = (SELECT MAX(ID) FROM grafanadb.registro_consultas)
LIMIT
  1

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(fecha)
AS
  "Last2"
FROM
  grafanadb.registro_consultas
WHERE
  ID = (SELECT MAX(ID) - 2 FROM grafanadb.registro_consultas)
LIMIT
  1

panels.description: Gráfica del tiempo que se demora el sistema en hacer todo el procesamiento de los datos

targets.rawSql:
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(fecha) AS "LastA", fecha
   FROM grafanadb.registro_consultas
   WHERE
     (ID = (SELECT MAX(ID) FROM grafanadb.registro_consultas) OR MOD(ID, 2) = 0)
     AND fecha >= NOW() - INTERVAL 5 MINUTE
   ORDER BY ID DESC;

SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(fecha) AS "LastB", fecha
FROM grafanadb.registro_consultas
WHERE
  (ID = (SELECT MAX(ID) FROM grafanadb.registro_consultas) OR MOD(ID, 2) = 0)
  AND fecha >= NOW() - INTERVAL 5 MINUTE
ORDER BY ID DESC
LIMIT 1, 1000;

panels.title: Tiempo

panels.description: El histograma ayudará a entender cuál es la frecuencia de eventos de agresión
panels.title: Histograma

panels.description:
Revisar el estado de cada consulta ejecutada
Se realizó: 1 (consulta exitosa)
Se realizó: 0 (consulta no exitosa)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
consulta, exitosa, fecha
FROM
  grafanadb.registro_consultas
ORDER BY
  ID DESC
LIMIT
  100

panels.title: Log de Errores

targets.query:
from(bucket: "telegrafdb")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device"] == "D:" or r["device"] == "C:" or r["device"] == "E:" or r["device"] == "F:")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "telegrafdb")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_system" or r["_field"] == "usage_user" or r["_field"] == "usage_steal" or r["_field"] == "usage_nice")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "telegrafdb")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  valor_prediccion
FROM
  (SELECT * FROM grafanadb.predicciones ORDER BY ID DESC LIMIT 100) AS subquery
ORDER BY
  ID ASC
